entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries at times heavy and ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
